parts.text: {"word":"shapes","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"形、形状、外形","english_definition":"the external form or appearance of something; the outline of an area or figure.","examples":[{"sentence":"The clouds were in interesting shapes.","translation":"雲は面白い形をしていた。"},{"sentence":"The artist experimented with different shapes.","translation":"その芸術家は様々な形を試した。"},{"sentence":"The shape of the Earth is roughly spherical.","translation":"地球の形はおおよそ球形である。"}],"collocations":["geometric shapes (幾何学的な形)","various shapes (様々な形)","basic shapes (基本的な形)","irregular shapes (不規則な形)","distinct shapes (明確な形)","abstract shapes (抽象的な形)"],"synonyms":["form","figure","outline","contour","configuration","appearance"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(人の)体型、スタイル","english_definition":"the physical form or condition of a person's body.","examples":[{"sentence":"He's in good shape for his age.","translation":"彼は年齢の割に体型が良い。"},{"sentence":"She's trying to get back into shape after the baby.","translation":"彼女は出産後、体型を元に戻そうとしている。"},{"sentence":"He needs to get in shape before the hiking trip.","translation":"彼はハイキング旅行の前に体を鍛える必要がある。"}],"collocations":["good shape (良い体型)","bad shape (悪い体型)","out of shape (体型が崩れている)","get in shape (体を鍛える)","lose shape (体型が崩れる)","physical shape (身体的な状態)"],"synonyms":["condition","form","fitness","health"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"状態、状況","english_definition":"the condition of something.","examples":[{"sentence":"The car is in bad shape.","translation":"その車は状態が悪い。"},{"sentence":"The economy is in good shape.","translation":"経済は良い状態にある。"},{"sentence":"The old house was in terrible shape.","translation":"その古い家はひどい状態だった。"}],"collocations":["good shape (良い状態)","bad shape (悪い状態)","terrible shape (ひどい状態)","poor shape (悪い状態)","rough shape (荒れた状態)","general shape (全体的な状態)"],"synonyms":["condition","state","situation","order","repair"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"形作る、成形する、形成する","english_definition":"give a particular shape or form to.","examples":[{"sentence":"The potter shaped the clay into a vase.","translation":"陶芸家は粘土を花瓶の形に成形した。"},{"sentence":"The sculptor shaped the stone into a statue.","translation":"彫刻家は石を彫刻の形に形作った。"},{"sentence":"The events shaped his character.","translation":"その出来事は彼の性格を形成した。"}],"collocations":["shape clay (粘土を形作る)","shape metal (金属を形作る)","shape ideas (アイデアを形作る)","shape policy (政策を形成する)","shape opinion (意見を形成する)","shape the future (未来を形作る)"],"synonyms":["form","mold","fashion","create","construct","design"],"antonyms":["destroy","deform"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「Shape」は古英語の「scieppan」（作る、創造する）に由来し、ゲルマン祖語の「skapjanan」に遡ります。名詞としての「形状」の意味は、動詞の「作る」から派生しました。","priority":"★☆☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ʃeɪps/","syllables":"shapes"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"shapes","verb_forms":{"present_simple":["shape","shapes"],"past_simple":"shaped","past_participle":"shaped","present_participle":"shaping"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「Shapes」は「shape」の複数形であり、名詞としては様々な形や形状を指します。また、人の体型や物の状態を表すこともあります。動詞としては、何かを特定の形に作り上げること、または何かが人の性格や状況を形成することを意味します。文脈によって意味が大きく変わるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He is in a good shape of health.","correct":"✓ He is in good shape.","note":"「体調が良い」という意味では、"of health"は不要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The shape of the building are modern.","correct":"✓ The shape of the building is modern.","note":"主語が単数形の「shape」なので、動詞も単数形の「is」を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I'm trying to shape my body good.","correct":"✓ I'm trying to shape my body well.","note":"「体をうまく鍛える」という意味では、副詞の「well」を使います。"}],"priority":"★☆☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["shapeless (形容詞: 形のない、だらしない)","shaper (名詞: 成形する人、形成するもの)","shaping (名詞: 成形、形成)"],"phrasal_verbs":["shape up (うまくいく、調子が良くなる、態度を改める)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2 (基本的な「形」の意味)、B1 (状態や体型)、B2 (形成する)","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Moderate frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「shapes」は「形」という意味の「shape」の複数形です。雲の形や、積み木などの物の形を指すときに使われます。また、「体型」や「状態」という意味もあります。「He is in good shape.（彼は体調が良い）」のように使います。動詞としては、「形作る」という意味で使われ、「The potter shapes the clay.（陶芸家は粘土を形作る）」のように使います。文脈によって意味が異なるので注意しましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The children were playing with colorful **shapes**.","translation":"子供たちはカラフルな形で遊んでいた。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"形"},{"sentence":"He's trying to get back into **shape** after the holidays.","translation":"彼は休暇後、体型を元に戻そうとしている。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"体型"},{"sentence":"The old car was in terrible **shape**.","translation":"その古い車はひどい状態だった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"状態"},{"sentence":"The experience **shaped** her into a strong leader.","translation":"その経験は彼女を強いリーダーに育てた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"形作る"},{"sentence":"The clouds formed interesting **shapes** in the sky.","translation":"雲が空に面白い形を作った。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"形"},{"sentence":"The sculptor **shaped** the marble into a beautiful statue.","translation":"彫刻家は石膏を美しい彫刻に形作った。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"形作る"}]}
